UNIWA, in the context of its continuous evolvement, has developed significant re-search activity in all scientific fields served by its departments. The University’s research approach is interconnected with its educational mission and aims to enhance research through creative collaborations with universities, research centers and institutions at both national and international levels.

The successful implementation of all research programs is based on draws upon the knowledge and experience of the scientific staff of the University supported by the available, modern infrastructure and equipment.

Research activity is for UNIPA an essential factor in promoting innovation, transfer of know-how practices and upgrade of teaching and education.

UNIWA’s research activity gains increasing visibility through the numerous publications of original articles in international peer-reviewed journals or in national and international conference proceedings.
